name: Horrible Night
description:
Use the Space bar to jump

Press the Q Key to trigger invincibility when the energy bar is full

Players need to collect 50 pumpkins to win. Players can also collect blue flames to accumulate energy bars. Players need to collect pumpkins and flames while also avoiding ghosts.

In the invincible state, the player has three chances to touch the ghost, meaning that the player will not lose blood when touching the ghost in the invincible state.
